data.name: Big Ambitions
data.detailed_description:
Also check out our first game: Startup Company

https://store.steampowered.com/app/606800/Startup_Company/


About the Game

Big Ambitions is a revolutionary role-playing business sim. Starting from the bottom, you take over the city, from small businesses to huge corporations.

You control a single person in the middle of the bustling metropolis of New York City. Your goal is to achieve financial success in any way you like.

As you progress, you always need to make sure that you're getting enough sleep, keeping up with your health, and making sure your happiness is sufficient. Increasing your capital can be trickier than you think. As you will learn, money can't buy time.



Gift shops, supermarkets, fast food restaurants, coffee shops, law firms, web design agencies, and much more. The hardest part is choosing where to start.






Everyone wants a nice home. In Big Ambitions, you can finally achieve your dreams, whether it’s a modern skyscraper apartment in Midtown, or a luxurious townhouse in Hell’s Kitchen. Of course, it will be filled with designer furniture.






As your empire expands, you’ll have to start importing products from the harbor and distributing them through a network of warehouses.






As your workforce starts to really expand, you’ll need help from HR Managers, Logistics Managers, and Purchasing Agents. They all need desks and computers, and for that, you’ll need a fancy headquarters.






Make sure to represent yourself and your company in the best way possible. Whether it be a big SUV, a speedy sports car, or the new luxurious Mersaidi S500.






Any wise businessman would never let money burn in their pocket. Buy real estate around the city or put your money into investment funds.






The Big Ambitions Beta is already available through Steam Playtest (paid access available via our website). You can read all the reviews here: https://steamcommunity.com/app/1648860/reviews/?filterLanguage=all&p=1&browsefilter=mostrecent

data.short_description: Big Ambitions is a revolutionary role-playing business sim. Starting from the bottom, you take over the city, from small businesses to huge corporations. Your goal is to become the biggest tycoon of New York.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 960 or similiar
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 2060 or similiar
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
